descriptions:
["DescriptionPixel is the first mixed-use community at Makers District, that offers its residents & visitors a unique space to enrich, collaborate & engage. Designed as human-scale, the 7 mixed-use residential towers surrounded by quiet pocket gardens have been strategically arranged around a vibrant pedestrianized plaza. This plaza will include artisanal dining, oﬀering homegrown restaurants & cafes, as well as co-working spaces, offices, shops & a signature water feature.
Pixel makes living easy. Every service is available within the community & its pedestrianized plaza; from medical clinics to hair salons, to kindergartens & laundromats, to coffee shops, & kid’s playgrounds. Swimming pool, Gym and Rooftops.
#WEAREPIXEL
'About Us' - Developer Bio:
IMKAN is an Abu Dhabi-based real estate developer with a portfolio of 26 projects spanning four continents. We aim to create soulful places that enrich people’s lives.
Our proposition is built around a unique research platform that uncovers the distinct social behaviors and habits of speciﬁc market segments, from millennials to discerning high-net-worth individuals; to formulate tailored user proﬁles. This research-led approach enables us to shape communities that are in tune with the mindset of each proﬁle.
From our headquarters in Abu Dhabi, we manage an extensive portfolio of projects, in various stages of development and in the pipeline, that span over 30 million sqm across four continents. We’re a wholly owned subsidiary of Abu Dhabi Capital Group (ADCG). Our key projects include two developments in Makers District; The—Artery, a multi-use building that integrates a makers’ space with a parking garage, and Pixel, our ﬁrst mixed-use destination. In addition, our portfolio includes Nudra, a luxury beach-side villa community, and Sheikha Fatima Park, an open-air project that seeks to enhance community interaction."]

descriptions: ["DescriptionGreat Launch Offer:* Pay 75% Now & Move-In* 25% 1-Year Post Completion Payment Plan*\xa0100% DLD Waiver*\xa03 Years Service Charges Waiver* Ready* Investor Deal* 10% ROI* Lush Green ViewsMaple is a community of elegantly designed townhouses located West of Dubai Hills Estate. Developed by Emaar Properties, Maple consists of 118 three, four and five-bedroom townhouses in an area that emphasizes an indoor and outdoor lifestyle. The townhouses range from 2,200 to 2,700 sq.ft with each unit including a maid's room, covered parking for one vehicle and lush gardens around the homes. These carefully constructed homes are draped in luxury with spacious and sophisticated floor plan designs. Each home features large windows that provide bright indoor spaces, an elegantly designed kitchen with granite countertops, spacious bedrooms with built-in wardrobes and marble finishes that proceed to the en-suite bathroom. Endless outdoor amenities surround the homes. These amenities include but are not limited to swimming pools, a bbq area, kids play area, basketball court, daycare center, jogging, and cycling paths. The green gardens in the community promote a healthy lifestyle and social interactions among community residents.\xa0This Maple is an excellent location close to Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road and Al Khail Road while being outside of the busy Dubai lifestyle. Homeowners are minutes away from Downtown Dubai, business, tourism and shopping outlets. Moreover, residents will have easy access to the Etihad Rail and metro lines which will be adjacent to the estate.\xa0Call Harbor Real Estate on +971509166543 / +97143251616 or visit www.harbordubai.com for further details"]

descriptions:
['DescriptionOrient Towers is a luxurious residential complex development consisting of four mid-rise residential towers connected with podium level, located in one of the Ajman’s most popular residential community "Al Bustan", overlooking to the Ajman Creek and minutes away to Ajman Corniche Road, Ajman Harbor, and the Ajman Heritage City, this unique and strategic location offers the residents a lifestyle that celebrates the modern spirit of family living. 
Each tower offers varied options of apartments that have been designed to satisfy all modern lifestyle that you deserve, ranging from studio, one, two and three-bedroom units, most of them have breathtaking and scenic views of the creek as well as a vista of adjoining landscaped area.

descriptions:
['DescriptionOrient Towers is a luxurious residential complex development consisting of four mid-rise residential towers connected with podium level, located in one of the Ajman’s most popular residential community "Al Bustan", overlooking to the Ajman Creek and minutes away to Ajman Corniche Road, Ajman Harbor, and the Ajman Heritage City, this unique and strategic location offers the residents a lifestyle that celebrates the modern spirit of family living. 
Each tower offers varied options of apartments that have been designed to satisfy all modern lifestyle that you deserve, ranging from studio, one, two and three-bedroom units, most of them have breathtaking and scenic views of the creek as well as a vista of adjoining landscaped area.
